items.label: cor-net-velocity-contraction
items.title: Net Velocity Variance Contraction for Composed Operator
items.content:
2292: :label: cor-net-velocity-contraction
2293: 
2294: From 03_cloning.md, the cloning operator satisfies:
2295: 
2296: $$
2297: \mathbb{E}_{\text{clone}}[\Delta V_{\text{Var},v}] \leq C_v
2298: 
2299: $$
2300: 
2301: Combining with the kinetic dissipation:
2302: 
2303: $$
2304: \mathbb{E}_{\text{clone} \circ \text{kin}}[\Delta V_{\text{Var},v}] \leq -2\gamma V_{\text{Var},v} \tau + (d\sigma_{\max}^2 \tau + C_v)
2305: 
2306: $$
2307: 
2308: **For net contraction, we need:**
2309: 
2310: $$
2311: 2\gamma V_{\text{Var},v} \tau > d\sigma_{\max}^2 \tau + C_v
2312: 
2313: $$
2314: 
2315: **This holds when:**
2316: 
2317: $$
2318: V_{\text{Var},v} > \frac{d\sigma_{\max}^2}{2\gamma} + \frac{C_v}{2\gamma\tau}
2319: 
2320: $$
2321: 
2322: **Equilibrium bound:**
2323: At equilibrium where $\mathbb{E}[\Delta V_{\text{Var},v}] = 0$:
2324: 
2325: $$
2326: V_{\text{Var},v}^{\text{eq}} \approx \frac{d\sigma_{\max}^2}{2\gamma} + \frac{C_v}{2\gamma\tau}
2327: 
2328: $$
2329: 
2330: **Interpretation:** The equilibrium velocity variance is determined by the balance between:
2331: - Thermal noise injection ($\sigma_{\max}^2$)
items.section: ## 5. Velocity Variance Dissipation via Langevin Friction
items.raw_directive:
2289: ### 5.5. Balancing with Cloning Expansion
2290: 
2291: :::{prf:corollary} Net Velocity Variance Contraction for Composed Operator
2292: :label: cor-net-velocity-contraction
2293: 
2294: From 03_cloning.md, the cloning operator satisfies:
2295: 
2296: $$
2297: \mathbb{E}_{\text{clone}}[\Delta V_{\text{Var},v}] \leq C_v
2298: 
2299: $$
2300: 
2301: Combining with the kinetic dissipation:
2302: 
2303: $$
2304: \mathbb{E}_{\text{clone} \circ \text{kin}}[\Delta V_{\text{Var},v}] \leq -2\gamma V_{\text{Var},v} \tau + (d\sigma_{\max}^2 \tau + C_v)
2305: 
2306: $$
2307: 
2308: **For net contraction, we need:**
2309: 
2310: $$
2311: 2\gamma V_{\text{Var},v} \tau > d\sigma_{\max}^2 \tau + C_v
2312: 
2313: $$
2314: 
2315: **This holds when:**
2316: 
2317: $$
2318: V_{\text{Var},v} > \frac{d\sigma_{\max}^2}{2\gamma} + \frac{C_v}{2\gamma\tau}
2319: 
2320: $$
2321: 
2322: **Equilibrium bound:**
2323: At equilibrium where $\mathbb{E}[\Delta V_{\text{Var},v}] = 0$:
2324: 
2325: $$
2326: V_{\text{Var},v}^{\text{eq}} \approx \frac{d\sigma_{\max}^2}{2\gamma} + \frac{C_v}{2\gamma\tau}
2327: 
2328: $$
2329: 
2330: **Interpretation:** The equilibrium velocity variance is determined by the balance between:
2331: - Thermal noise injection ($\sigma_{\max}^2$)
2332: - Friction dissipation ($\gamma$)

items.label: cor-net-positional-contraction
items.title: Net Positional Variance Contraction for Composed Operator
items.content:
2700: :label: cor-net-positional-contraction
2701: 
2702: From 03_cloning.md Theorem 10.3.1, the cloning operator satisfies:
2703: 
2704: $$
2705: \mathbb{E}_{\text{clone}}[\Delta V_{\text{Var},x}] \leq -\kappa_x V_{\text{Var},x} + C_x
2706: 
2707: $$
2708: 
2709: Combining with kinetic expansion:
2710: 
2711: $$
2712: \mathbb{E}_{\text{clone} \circ \text{kin}}[\Delta V_{\text{Var},x}] \leq -\kappa_x V_{\text{Var},x} + (C_x + C_{\text{kin},x}\tau)
2713: 
2714: $$
2715: 
2716: **For net contraction:**
2717: 
2718: $$
2719: \kappa_x V_{\text{Var},x} > C_x + C_{\text{kin},x}\tau
2720: 
2721: $$
2722: 
2723: **This holds when:**
2724: 
2725: $$
2726: V_{\text{Var},x} > \frac{C_x + C_{\text{kin},x}\tau}{\kappa_x}
2727: 
2728: $$
items.raw_directive:
2697: ### 6.5. Balancing with Cloning Contraction
2698: 
2699: :::{prf:corollary} Net Positional Variance Contraction for Composed Operator
2700: :label: cor-net-positional-contraction
2701: 
2702: From 03_cloning.md Theorem 10.3.1, the cloning operator satisfies:
2703: 
2704: $$
2705: \mathbb{E}_{\text{clone}}[\Delta V_{\text{Var},x}] \leq -\kappa_x V_{\text{Var},x} + C_x
2706: 
2707: $$
2708: 
2709: Combining with kinetic expansion:
2710: 
2711: $$
2712: \mathbb{E}_{\text{clone} \circ \text{kin}}[\Delta V_{\text{Var},x}] \leq -\kappa_x V_{\text{Var},x} + (C_x + C_{\text{kin},x}\tau)
2713: 
2714: $$
2715: 
2716: **For net contraction:**
2717: 
2718: $$
2719: \kappa_x V_{\text{Var},x} > C_x + C_{\text{kin},x}\tau
2720: 
2721: $$
2722: 
2723: **This holds when:**
2724: 
2725: $$
2726: V_{\text{Var},x} > \frac{C_x + C_{\text{kin},x}\tau}{\kappa_x}
2727: 
2728: $$
2729:

items.label: cor-total-boundary-safety
items.title: Total Boundary Safety from Dual Mechanisms
items.content:
3177: :label: cor-total-boundary-safety
3178: 
3179: Combining the Safe Harbor mechanism from cloning (03_cloning.md, Ch 11) with the confining potential:
3180: 
3181: **From cloning:**
3182: 
3183: $$
3184: \mathbb{E}_{\text{clone}}[\Delta W_b] \leq -\kappa_b W_b + C_b
3185: 
3186: $$
3187: 
3188: **From kinetics:**
3189: 
3190: $$
3191: \mathbb{E}_{\text{kin}}[\Delta W_b] \leq -\kappa_{\text{pot}} W_b \tau + C_{\text{pot}}\tau
3192: 
3193: $$
3194: 
3195: **Combined:**
3196: 
3197: $$
3198: \mathbb{E}_{\text{total}}[\Delta W_b] \leq -(\kappa_b + \kappa_{\text{pot}}\tau) W_b + (C_b + C_{\text{pot}}\tau)
3199: 
3200: $$
items.section: ## 7. Boundary Potential Contraction via Confining Potential
items.raw_directive:
3174: ### 7.5. Layered Safety Architecture
3175: 
3176: :::{prf:corollary} Total Boundary Safety from Dual Mechanisms
3177: :label: cor-total-boundary-safety
3178: 
3179: Combining the Safe Harbor mechanism from cloning (03_cloning.md, Ch 11) with the confining potential:
3180: 
3181: **From cloning:**
3182: 
3183: $$
3184: \mathbb{E}_{\text{clone}}[\Delta W_b] \leq -\kappa_b W_b + C_b
3185: 
3186: $$
3187: 
3188: **From kinetics:**
3189: 
3190: $$
3191: \mathbb{E}_{\text{kin}}[\Delta W_b] \leq -\kappa_{\text{pot}} W_b \tau + C_{\text{pot}}\tau
3192: 
3193: $$
3194: 
3195: **Combined:**
3196: 
3197: $$
3198: \mathbb{E}_{\text{total}}[\Delta W_b] \leq -(\kappa_b + \kappa_{\text{pot}}\tau) W_b + (C_b + C_{\text{pot}}\tau)
3199: 
3200: $$
3201:

_registry_context.section_id: ## 7. Boundary Potential Contraction via Confining Potential
